intro_text: p_l sees weird ripples on the water of a puddle while gathering fresh water.
decline_text: p_l is in a hurry and does not stop to look at the ripples.
success_text: As p_l looks into the puddle they are greeted by an intense vision. They drop what they are doing and race back to the camp to tell and consult with their leader.

They are greeted with the vision of a cat they had failed to save looking content and happy in StarClan saying that they were not at fault for their death. They feel unburdened and at peace after recieving that vision.
fail_text: They gaze into the puddle only to see the weird ripples were caused by a small frog. p_l feels dissapointed because they really could have used some guidance from StarClan.
